title: FuD
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar
description: Eclectic parlor serving vegan food with raw food and gluten-free options. Includes raw tacos, rice "meat" and cashew cheese, soft serve cashew ice cream with cacao fudge sauce, pulled jack BBQ sandwich, raw ice cream, and vegan donuts. Brunch on Saturday. Previously order at the counter and change to table service. Operating since Apr 2010 in Kansas City Westside neighborhood.
